a.style: font-family:'Playfair Display', Georgia, 'Times New Roman', 'Liberation Serif', serif

text.tspan: Weekly working hours vs. hourly wage, by wage decile
Includes individuals in both paid and self-employment.
Most of the data is from 2005 or within a few years of 2005.
Data source: Bick, Fuchs-Schündeln, and Lagakos (2018)
